SEARCH
Package com.financial.entries

Class RegularBudgetRevenue

java.lang.Object
com.financial.entries.BudgetEntry
com.financial.entries.BudgetRevenue
com.financial.entries.RegularBudgetRevenue
All Implemented Interfaces:
BudgetRevenueChanges, BudgetRevenueLogic
public class RegularBudgetRevenue extends BudgetRevenue implements BudgetRevenueLogic, BudgetRevenueChanges
Represents a revenue entry in the Regular Budget.

This class implements both BudgetRevenueLogic and BudgetRevenueChanges, providing specialized functionality for hierarchical navigation and automated amount adjustments specific to regular budget accounts.

  • Constructor Details

    • RegularBudgetRevenue

      public RegularBudgetRevenue(String code, String description, String category, long amount)
      Constructs a new RegularBudgetRevenue and automatically synchronizes it with the global BudgetRevenue filtered list.
      Parameters:
      code - the unique financial code
      description - a brief description of the revenue
      category - the financial category (e.g., "ΕΣΟΔΑ")
      amount - the initial amount in euros

    • setAmount

      public void setAmount(long amount)
      Sets the amount for this revenue entry.

      Includes validation to prevent negative amounts by triggering a history reversal and performs automatic rounding to the nearest hundred.

      Overrides:
      setAmount in class BudgetEntry
      Parameters:
      amount - the new amount to set
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the provided amount is negative
